text: Do we have a floatingpoint-robust way of recovering the index of the value of a range?

elements.text: Do we have a floatingpoint-robust way of recovering the index of the value of a range?

text:
```function rangeindex(arange, avalue; rounding=RoundNearest)
  displacement = avalue - arange.ref
  steps = displacement / arange.step
  index  = 1 + trunc(Int, round(steps.hi, rounding))
  return index
end```
